ARABIC: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And also in Musa when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: As (there was) in Moses when We sent him to the Pharaoh with clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: There is also a Sign for you in the story of Moses when We sent him with a clear authority to Pharaoh.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: There is also evidence (of the Truth) in the story of Moses when We sent him to the Pharaoh with clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And in Moosa, when We sent him with a clear proof towards Firaun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And in Musa, when We sent him to Fir`awn with a manifest authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And in Musa: When We sent him to Firon with clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And also in Moses, when We sent him unto Pharaoh, with a clear authority,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And in Moses (too, there is a portent) when We sent him unto Pharaoh with clear warrant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: There is another sign in Moses: We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And in Musa also was a lesson, when We sent him Unto Fir'awn with authority manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And in Moses [too there is a sign] when We sent him to Pharaoh with a manifest authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And in Moses (was another Sign): Behold, We sent him to Pharaoh, with authority manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And in Musa (Moses) (too, there is a sign). When We sent him to Fir'aun (Pharaoh) with a manifest authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: In Moses, too, (there were signs). We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And in Moses. We sent him to Pharaoh with a clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:38] And [a sign too] in Moses (wa-fī Mūsā is a supplement to fīhā, ‘therein’), that is to say, We also left a sign in the story of Moses, when We sent him to Pharaoh, vested, with a clear warrant, with a manifest proof;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And in Moses (too, there is a portent) when We sent him unto Pharaoh with clear warrant) with clear proof: the hand and the staff,
